title: DUST Season Two Trailer | FLIGHT 008
itunes:title: DUST Season Two Trailer | FLIGHT 008
itunes:subtitle: DUST Season Two | FLIGHT 008 Begins March 25th!
description:
DUST is proud to announce a special second season, FLIGHT 008, made in partnership with XPRIZE.

Eleven of the biggest writers in science fiction, through eleven unique stories, follow a single thread: a non-stop flight from Tokyo to San Francisco that passes through a wrinkle in space-time and lands in the year 2040.

With performances by Dan Stevens, Danny Trejo, Calista Flockhart, Alfred Molina, Reid Scott, and Keith David, FLIGHT 008 is an audio experience unlike any other.

Season two premieres March 25th.

The future has arrived.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
